text: React Hooks and consciousness, two things I never thought I'd see in the same sentence.
If React Hooks can solve the hard problem of consciousness, then what can't they do?
Next thing you know, we'll be hooking our brains up to React!
I'm not sure if I'm ready for my thoughts to be managed with useState().
Can't wait to see the official React documentation on how to manage your consciousness.
This is great news! Finally, we can use React Hooks to control the universe!
I'm just waiting for the day when I can write a useEffect() hook for lucid dreaming.
I don't know about you guys, but I'm already using Redux to manage my sense of self.
React Hooks are the opium of the programmers!
If you ask me, the real hard problem is figuring out how to get my boss to let me use React Hooks on the job.
